Class SymGraph

java.lang.Object
Graph
SymGraph
public class SymGraph extends Graph
SymGraph class inherits from the Graph class made in the Graph.java makes the attributes to take the co-ordinate values as a arraylist and save them in a memory has a constructor which takes vertices and coordinates and stores them in a memory in an optimized way

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    convertCoordsToEdges()
    constructor activates convertCoordsToEdges method transfers the data of the coordinates to the edges value so that the distance can be calculated for the symmetric file
    ArrayList
    getCoordinates()
    getCoordinates is an Arraylist type method which gets the coordinates from the file and uses them to calculate distance overrides the original getCoorsinates method
    float
    getDistance​(int source, int destination)
    getDistance method has a float dataype because it may have float distance value calculates the distance between source that is array[0] and destination that is array[1]
    boolean
    isSymmetric()
    isSymmetric method is a Boolean type methos which checks if the graph is displayed for only symmetric file overrides the original isSymmetric method

  • Method Details

    • convertCoordsToEdges

      private void convertCoordsToEdges()
      constructor activates convertCoordsToEdges method transfers the data of the coordinates to the edges value so that the distance can be calculated for the symmetric file

    • getCoordinates

      public ArrayList getCoordinates()
      getCoordinates is an Arraylist type method which gets the coordinates from the file and uses them to calculate distance overrides the original getCoorsinates method
      Overrides:
      getCoordinates in class Graph
      Returns:
      gets the coordinates

    • isSymmetric

      public boolean isSymmetric()
      isSymmetric method is a Boolean type methos which checks if the graph is displayed for only symmetric file overrides the original isSymmetric method
      Overrides:
      isSymmetric in class Graph
      Returns:
      gives True if symmetric, otherwise False

    • getDistance

      public float getDistance​(int source, int destination)
      getDistance method has a float dataype because it may have float distance value calculates the distance between source that is array[0] and destination that is array[1]
      Overrides:
      getDistance in class Graph
      Parameters:
      source - coordinate of the source point of the array
      destination - coordinate of the destination point of the array
      Returns:
      gives the calculated distance if there is any data in the memory, else just returns the points
